item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Abbey on Admiral Street (near PC)

The Abby is a neighborhood sports bar of the best kind and known for their burgers - yup, they're REALLY that good. This is also the home of the very first Providence Collective Meetup ever in 2008! It's hard to believe we haven't been back since May 2010, so we're way overdue. The Abby truly is a great spot to watch any sporting event, and even if you don't watch sports, its a cozy place to hang out so, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can't miss us, but just in case, I'll be wearing a silver scarf.
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - The Abby!
